name: @peakfijn/template-laravel
description: Packages and template to create a new project for Laravel with Peakfijn standards
author: Cedric van Putten <cedric@peakfijn.nl>

scripts.lint: eslint ./packages --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx || echo 'still waiting first package'; exit 0
scripts.clean: tsc -b --clean && lerna clean --yes && lerna exec 'git clean -xdf build package-lock.json'
scripts.publish: tsc -b --clean && lerna exec 'git clean -xdf build package-lock.json' && tsc -b && lerna publish
